metadata.description: Official Every plugin marketplace for Claude Code extensions

plugins.name: compounding-engineering
plugins.description: AI-powered development tools that get smarter with every use. Make each unit of engineering work easier than the last. Includes 24 specialized agents, 16 commands, and 11 skills.

plugins.name: compounding-engineering-lite
plugins.description: Lightweight practices-focused plugin for any project. Code review with continuous learning via .claude/practices/. Includes 6 specialized agents, 2 commands, and 1 skill.
